dataList.name: Nethersea Brand
dataList.desc:
Nethersea Brand expands toward the Sinners with each passing turn.
- Stage 1 : Sea Terror territory
- Stage 2 : 2 frontmost Sinners
- Stage 3 : 5 frontmost Sinners
- Stage 4 : All Sinners
dataList.summary: The Nethersea Brand expands with each turn

dataList.name: Nethersea Brand
dataList.desc:
- Sinners on top of Nethersea Brand: at Turn End, take fixed damage equal to 5% HP and gain 3 Nervous Impairment
- Greatly increases the Nervous Impairment Stack Sea Terrors on top of Nethersea Brand inflict against Sinners
- Nethersea Brand's influence expands toward Sinner territory with each passing turn
· Stage 1 : Sea Terror territory
· Stage 2 : Affects 2 frontmost Sinners
· Stage 3 : Affects 5 frontmost Sinners
· Stage 4 : Affects all Sinners
dataList.summary:
Allies on top of Nethersea Brand takes fixed damage and gain Nervous Impairment.
Greatly increase the amount of Nervous Impairment inflicted against allies by enemies on top of Nethersea Brand

dataList.name: Sea Terror Assimilation
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack : 5
- Gain 1 Stack at Turn Start
- Gain 1 Offense Level Down and 1 Defense Level Down per Stack
- Turn End: if an allied Sinner has 5 Stacks of this effect, it Escapes Battlefield.
- When an allied Sinner has a Defense Skill equipped while it has this effect, they Escape Battlefield at Combat Start
dataList.summary: Gains Offense Level Down and Defense Level Down based on the Stack

dataList.name: Nervous Impairment
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack : 30
- At 30 Stack, become Staggered; then, take fixed damage equal to 25% HP, and remove this effect
dataList.summary: Become Staggered and take significant HP damage

dataList.name: Standby State
dataList.desc: - When in Standby State, this unit does not use Attack Skills until it takes damage
dataList.summary: When in Standby State, this unit does not use Attack Skills until it takes damage

dataList.name: Combat-Ready State
dataList.desc:
- After taking damage, this unit has begun to use its Attack Skills.
- Turn Start while in Combat-Ready State:
· Inflict 3 Nervous Impairment to all enemies
· Min & Max Speed +3
· Gain 1 Offense Level Up for every 10% missing HP (max 8)
- Turn End while in Combat-Ready State: take fixed damage equal to 10% HP
dataList.summary: After taking damage, this unit begins to use its Attack Skills

dataList.name: Abyssal Vitality
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack : 100
- Consumed when using certain Skills
- Every time this effect is consumed, Heal SP on self by the amount consumed
dataList.summary:
Consumed when using certain Skills

dataList.name: Indelible Compassion
dataList.desc:
- This unit does not lose Shield at Turn End (unless removed by damage or certain effects)
- When the Shield breaks due to getting hit, become Staggered and gain 5 Fragile until next turn
- When becoming Staggered due to raised Stagger threshold, gain 5 Fragile until next turn
- Fragile gained due to this buff's effects do not stack
- Shield HP can stack, however; when this effect is active, the shield HP cannot be more than 50% of the Shielded unit's max HP
- This effect counts as a 'Shield Management' effect. (replaced when gaining a different Shield Management effect)
dataList.summary:
Does not lose Shield at Turn End
When the Shield breaks, become very fragile

dataList.name: Cold

- If this unit has 3 Stacks after Skill End: take 20 Gloom damage and 20 SP damage; then, gain 1 Frozen this turn and next turn.
- Cold Stack expires after all effects are activated
- Turn End: if this unit did not attack The Last Knight, expires

· Unbrilliant Glory Gregor
· Tidal Elegy Ishmael
